rukus.text: 65|8|Don'nani oku no machi ga, omo to kare no shito-tachi no meirei ni somuita kotodearou. Sorede ware wa kibishiku seisan shi, ozomashi chobatsu de kare-ra o basshita.
65|9|Koshite kare-ra wa, sono okonai no warui kekka o ajiwai, saigo ni wa kekkyoku metsubo shita.
65|10|Arra wa kare-ra no tame ni, kibishi chobatsu o junbi nasa reru. Dakara shinko shi, shiryo aru hitobito yo, arra o osore nasai. Arra wa, kaku ni anata gata ni kyokun o kudasa re,

65|11|shito o tsukawashita. Kare ga arra no shirushi o anata gata ni dokuju shi, meihaku ni kaimei suru no wa, shinko shite zenko o nasu mono o, ankoku no fukami kara komyo no naka ni michibikidasu tamedearu. Oyoso arra o shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa,-ka ni kawa ga nagareru rakuen ni haira sa re, eien ni sono naka ni sumu nodearu. Hontoni arra wa, kare-ra no tame ni yoi o megumi o kudasa reru.

65|12|Arra koso wa, 7-so no ten to doyo ni (7-so no) daichi o, sozo nasa reta katadearu. (Arra no) o meirei wa sorera no ma kara kudasa reru. Hontoni arra wa, subete no koto ni zen'nodeari, mata subete no jibutsu o jukuchi sa rete iru koto o, anata ni wakara seru tamedearu.
